wrath.client.graphics

Class TextRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.client.graphics.TextRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable

    public class TextRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Closeable
    Class to load fonts and manage text rendering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextRenderer(java.io.File ttfFile, float fontSize)
      Creates a renderer to render the specified PNG font File.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Place anything that needs to be closed in this method.
      Color getColor()
      Gets the current Color of the font.
      float getFontSize()
      Gets the current Font size.
      void refreshRenderer()
      If the window is to close and re-open, this will be called automatically to re-generate textures.
      void renderString(java.lang.String string, float x, float y)
      Draws the specified string onto the screen at the specified points.
      void renderString(java.lang.String string, float x, float y, float fontSize, Color color)
      Draws the specified string onto the screen at the specified points independent of variables set in this object.
      void setColor(Color color)
      Sets the Color object describing the color of the text.
      void setFontSize(float fontSize)
      Sets the size of the font.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextRenderer

        public TextRenderer(java.io.File ttfFile,
                    float fontSize)
        Creates a renderer to render the specified PNG font File.
        Parameters:
        ttfFile - The File containing the font to render.
        fontSize - The size of the font. This is NOT standardized!

        public float getFontSize()
        Gets the current Font size.
        Returns:
        Returns the current Font size.

      • refreshRenderer

        public void refreshRenderer()
        If the window is to close and re-open, this will be called automatically to re-generate textures.

      • renderString

        public void renderString(java.lang.String string,
                         float x,
                         float y)
        Draws the specified string onto the screen at the specified points.
        Parameters:
        string - The {Link java.lang.String} to write to the screen.
        x - The X-coordinate of the top left of the message.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the top left of the message.

      • renderString

        public void renderString(java.lang.String string,
                         float x,
                         float y,
                         float fontSize,
                         Color color)
        Draws the specified string onto the screen at the specified points independent of variables set in this object. The only variable taken from the object in this method is the font itself.
        Parameters:
        string - The {Link java.lang.String} to write to the screen.
        x - The X-coordinate of the top left of the message.
        y - The Y-coordinate of the top left of the message.
        fontSize - The size of the font. This is NOT standardized!
        color - The Color to make the rendered text.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(Color color)
        Sets the Color object describing the color of the text.
        Parameters:
        color - The Color to make any rendered text.

      • setFontSize

        public void setFontSize(float fontSize)
        Sets the size of the font. This does NOT use the 'pt' unit!
        Parameters:
        fontSize - The size to set the font.
